segments.source_content: # Rippling SAML SSO

translations.zh-CN: # Rippling SAML 单点登录配置

segments.source_content: This section will show you how to set up your own custom SAML application for Rippling SAML.

translations.zh-CN: 本节将指导您如何为 Rippling SAML 设置自定义 SAML 应用程序。

segments.source_content: ## Create Application

translations.zh-CN: ## 创建应用程序

segments.source_content: You'll need to create a new **Custom App** from your Rippling account if the app is not already in the Rippling app directory.

translations.zh-CN: 若 Rippling 应用目录中尚未存在该应用，您需在 Rippling 账户中新建一个**自定义应用**。

segments.source_content: Go to **IT Management** > **Custom App** from the left navigation menu.

translations.zh-CN: 通过左侧导航菜单进入 **IT管理** > **自定义应用**。

segments.source_content: ![Rippling SAML Step 1](/images/docs/jackson/sso-providers/rippling/1.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Rippling SAML 步骤1](/images/docs/jackson/sso-providers/rippling/1.png)

segments.source_content: Click **Create New App** button to create a new application.

translations.zh-CN: 点击**创建新应用**按钮以新建应用程序。

segments.source_content: From the next screen, fill in the following fields:

translations.zh-CN: 在后续页面填写以下字段：

segments.source_content:
- **App Name**
- **Select Categories**
- **Upload Logo**
- **What type of app would you like to create?** - Make sure you select **Single Sign-On (SAML)** from the list.

translations.zh-CN:
- **应用名称**
- **选择分类**
- **上传图标**
- **您想创建哪种类型的应用？** - 请确保从列表中选择**单点登录(SAML)**。

segments.source_content: ![Rippling SAML Step 2](/images/docs/jackson/sso-providers/rippling/2.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Rippling SAML 步骤2](/images/docs/jackson/sso-providers/rippling/2.png)

segments.source_content: ## Configure Application

translations.zh-CN: ## 配置应用程序

segments.source_content: Copy the **IdP Metadata URL** or **IdP Metadata XML** from the next screen. You'll need this value to configure your SAML connection in SAML Jackson.

translations.zh-CN: 从后续页面复制**IdP元数据URL**或**IdP元数据XML**。该值将用于在 SAML Jackson 中配置您的SAML连接。

segments.source_content: ![Rippling SAML Step 3](/images/docs/jackson/sso-providers/rippling/3.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Rippling SAML 步骤3](/images/docs/jackson/sso-providers/rippling/3.png)

segments.source_content: You'll need to enter the **ACS URL** and **Entity ID**. You'll get these values from SAML Jackson.

translations.zh-CN: 您需要输入**ACS URL**和**实体ID**。这些值可从 SAML Jackson 获取。

segments.source_content: ![Rippling SAML Step 4](/images/docs/jackson/sso-providers/rippling/4.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Rippling SAML 步骤4](/images/docs/jackson/sso-providers/rippling/4.png)

segments.source_content: Make sure that **Service Provider Entity ID** matches the **SAML Audience (SP Entity ID)** value from SAML Jackson.

translations.zh-CN: 确保**服务提供商实体ID**与 SAML Jackson 中的**SAML受众(SP实体ID)**值匹配。

segments.source_content: From the **Settings** tab of custom app you just created. Go to **Advanced SAML Settings** section and check the box for **Disable InResponseTo field in assertions for IdP initiated SSO**.

translations.zh-CN: 在您刚创建的自定义应用的**设置**选项卡中，进入**高级SAML设置**部分，勾选**禁用IdP发起的SSO断言中的InResponseTo字段**。

segments.source_content: This is because Rippling sends dummy values for the **InResponseTo** field and SAML Jackson will try to validate the **InResponseTo** field if it is present.

translations.zh-CN: 由于 Rippling 会为**InResponseTo**字段发送虚拟值，而 SAML Jackson 将尝试验证该字段（若存在）。

segments.source_content: ![Rippling SAML Step 5](/images/docs/jackson/sso-providers/rippling/5.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Rippling SAML 步骤5](/images/docs/jackson/sso-providers/rippling/5.png)

segments.source_content: ## Next steps

translations.zh-CN: ## 后续步骤

segments.source_content: You've successfully configured your custom SAML application for Rippling SAML. At this stage, you can assign users to your application and start using it.

translations.zh-CN: 您已成功为 Rippling SAML 配置自定义应用。此时可为应用分配用户并开始使用。
